description: This file defines a Spring Boot REST controller that provides endpoints for generating PDF versions of invoices on demand. It handles HTTP GET requests to produce invoice PDFs, utilizing services for invoice retrieval and PDF rendering.

classes.name: InvoicePdfController
classes.description: Spring REST controller providing endpoints to generate invoice PDFs, secured with role-based access, returning PDFs streamed as HTTP responses.

methods.name: InvoicePdfController
methods.description: Constructor initializing the controller with invoice and PDF rendering services.

methods.name: pdf
methods.description: Handles GET requests to generate and return a PDF for a specific invoice, identified by its ID, with security restrictions.
